Type:

Routes of Administration: oral

Pediatric_Dosing.text:
<10 years old: 5 mg/kg PO daily, max 150 mg/day
10 years or older: 100 mg PO BID

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: C
Lactation risk: Infant risk cannot be ruled out
Renal dosing, CrCl <30: 100 mg PO daily
Severe liver disease: 100 mg PO daily

Serious.text:
Heart block, syncope heart failure
Cerebrovascular and spinal vascular disorders
Seizure
Hallucinations
Bronchospasm

Common.text:
Nausea/vomiting, abdominal pain, anorexia, xerostomia
Asthenia, dizziness, fatigue
Nervousness, insomnia
Headache
